update tnc_store
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update tnc_store set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_id = #{addrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, service_tel = #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_phone = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from tnc_store
AND ( name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR manager_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR manager_phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR service_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
